mapper.sql: com_id, id, create_time, user_id, title, content, use_time, state, phone
mapper.select: select c.*,u.user_name as userName from complaint as c LEFT JOIN `user` as u on u.user_id=c.user_id where c.com_id = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into complaint

id,
create_time,
user_id,
title,
content,
use_time,
state,
phone,
image_url

mapper.update:
update complaint
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_time = #{useTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where com_id = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update complaint set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_time = #{useTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where com_id = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
